contactParagraph: Feel free to <1>reach out</1> to us with any questions or <1>concerns</1> you may have. <1>We</1> will get back to you as soon as <1>possible</1>.
name: Name
notAuthorizedErr: You are not authorized to access this page.
notAuthorizedParagraph: You can not proceed from here. You have to be logged in.
editUserParagraph: Edit the <1>user</1> on the team. <1>Change</1> the form and be sure to include all the necessary <1>information</1>.
userParagraph: Bring a new <1>user</1> to the team. <1>Fill out</1> the form and be sure to include all the necessary <1>information</1>.
editUserParagraph2: Keep in mind that you can not change the <1>username</1>.
userParagraph2: Keep in mind that you can not change the <1>username</1> once it is set.
